title: Ultra-Exclusive Cloudy Bay Winery Experience with Wine Tasting & Three-Course Private Chef Dinner
description:
For a truly exclusive experience amid the vines, only a stay at one of New Zealand's most celebrated wineries will do. The highly exclusive and luxurious 'The Shack' at Cloudy Bay Vineyard effortlessly fuses world-class food, award-winning wine and architect-designed, self-contained accommodation.

Normally available by invite only, this once-in-a-lifetime stay is the ultimate wine and unwind destination for a romantic sojourn or unforgettable group escape, comfortably sleeping up to eight guests across four rooms in a guesthouse that wouldn't look out of place on Grand Designs - complete with a suspended fireplace with views of Richmond Range. For a gastronomic affair to remember, enjoy a private one-of-a-kind vineyard tour and wine tasting, whip up your own creations in The Shack's state-of-the-art kitchen - where you'll enjoy access to a private wine fridge - and savour an intimate three-course epicurean dining experience with your very own private chef.

title: Exclusive Cloudy Bay Winery Stay with Private Chef Dining Experience
description:
Experience unparalleled luxury and exclusivity amid the vines at Cloudy Bay - one of New Zealandâ€™s most celebrated wineries - with a stay at 'The Shack', a highly exclusive and luxurious self-contained guesthouse, usually available by invite only. Treat yourself to an architecturally-designed, award-winning experience in a sought-after location on one of Marlborough's first wineries, where you'll enjoy a stay for up to eight guests with views of the breathtaking Richmond Range and Cloudy Bay vines.

Stay in the lap of luxury with daily breakfast provisions and a fully-equipped kitchen stocked with local gourmet products, local beer and a full selection of Cloudy Bay wines. This exclusive stay also includes a one-of-a-kind private Cloudy Bay vineyard tour with wine tasting, and an intimate three-course epicurean dining experience with your very own private chef and matched wines, taken for your choice of lunch or dinner.

**Travelling as a couple, with family or friends?** Simply select the package required according to the number of guests travelling, and you'll enjoy exclusive use of the house with access to one, two, three or four bedrooms accordingly.
